title: CES 2011 - How iRobot is furthering robotics applications
description: Sean Carruthers speaks with Charlie Vaida at CES 2011 about the various applications for iRobot Corp's latest in robotic devices. While many know of the floor cleaning robots by iRobot, you might not know that they also make robots that can search warzone

asset.author: iRobot
asset.hookText: Sean Carruthers speaks with Charlie Vaida at CES 2011 about the various applications for iRobot Corp's latest in robotic devices. While many know of the floor cleaning robots by iRobot, you might not know that they also make robots that can search warzones for bombs while controlled by an Xbox-style controller, or survey the seas for various data @ butterscotch.com: http://bit.ly/e0cbHF
